name: Turtle Rock
description: Turtle Rock is a popular rock formation in Joshua Tree National Park, known for its unique turtle-like shape and excellent rock climbing opportunities.

name: Silver Salmon Creek
park: Lake Clark National Park and Preserve
description: Silver Salmon Creek is a renowned spot for bear viewing and salmon fishing in Lake Clark National Park and Preserve.

name: Chilkoot Trail
park: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park
description: The Chilkoot Trail is a historic 33-mile trail that was a major access route from the coast to Yukon goldfields during the Klondike Gold Rush.

name: St. Mary Lake
description: St. Mary Lake is the second largest lake in Glacier National Park and offers stunning views and opportunities for boating and fishing.

name: Twin Lake
park: Lake Clark National Park and Preserve
description: Twin Lake is a remote and beautiful location in Lake Clark National Park and Preserve, perfect for wilderness enthusiasts and kayakers.

name: Lake McDonald
description: Lake McDonald is the largest lake in Glacier National Park, known for its clear waters, scenic views, and abundant wildlife.

name: Charley Rivers
description: Charley Rivers is a wild and scenic river in Charley Rivers National Preserve, offering opportunities for remote wilderness canoeing and rafting.

name: Icy Bay
park: Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve
description: Icy Bay is a spectacular bay in Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve, known for its calving glaciers and stunning mountain scenery.

name: Rainbow Lake
description: Rainbow Lake is a picturesque lake in Alaska's State Recreation Area, ideal for fishing, boating, and enjoying the serene surroundings.

name: Hidden Lake
description: Hidden Lake is a tranquil lake in North Cascades National Park, accessible via a challenging hike and offering stunning alpine scenery.

name: Chincoteague
description: Chincoteague is a popular destination in Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge, known for its wild ponies and beautiful coastal scenery.

name: Lake Umbagog
description: Lake Umbagog is a large, pristine lake in Umbagog National Wildlife Refuge, offering excellent opportunities for birdwatching, kayaking, and fishing.
